entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
